items.question: How does MentorIA work?
items.answer: MentorIA uses advanced artificial intelligence to analyze your content and generate high-quality educational materials. Simply enter your topic or paste content, choose the type of material you need, and our AI will create it in seconds.

items.question: Can I try before paying?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer a free plan that allows you to make up to 5 generations per day. It's perfect for trying all our features before deciding on a paid plan.

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: Currently, MentorIA supports Spanish, English, and French. We are working to add more languages soon.

items.question: Is my content secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. All your information is encrypted and we never share your data. We comply with all privacy and data protection regulations.
